title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Classic Margherita Pizza
summary: Fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil on a crispy thin crust.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
summary: Tender beef strips with snap peas, carrots, and bell peppers in a savory soy-ginger sauce.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Crisp cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, olives, and feta cheese with lemon-oregano dressing.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy Arborio rice slow-cooked with earthy mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Thinly sliced marinated pork with pineapple, onions, and cilantro on corn tortillas.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlicky butter-sauteed shrimp served over a bed of linguine pasta.

title: Avocado Toast with Egg
summary: Smashed avocado on sourdough bread topped with a perfectly poached egg and chili flakes.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: Rich beef broth with caramelized onions, topped with a baguette slice and melted Gruyere.

title: Vegetable Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
summary: Slow-cooked pork shoulder shredded and tossed in smoky barbecue sauce on a brioche bun.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A vibrant French Provencal stewed vegetable dish consisting of eggplant, zucchini, and peppers.

title: Eggs Benedict
summary: Poached eggs and Canadian bacon on English muffins, smothered in Hollandaise sauce.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: A hearty French beef stew braised in red wine with carrots, onions, and pearl mushrooms.

title: Falafel Wrap
summary: Crispy chickpea fritters with hummus, tahini, and pickles wrapped in soft flatbread.

title: Clam Chowder
summary: Thick and creamy New England style soup with clams, potatoes, and celery.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
summary: Romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, parmesan, and grilled chicken breast.

title: Beef Enchiladas
summary: Corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, rolled and topped with red chili sauce and cheese.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent chocolate sponge cake with a warm, liquid chocolate center.
